amendment.description: Pursuant to H. Res. 519, the amendment in the nature of a substitute now printed in the bill, H. Rept. 106- 651, shall be considered as adopted.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Ways and Means.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ways and Means amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
